title: Preseason Power-Up + Rankings Reactions, Megalabowl! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/23
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason react to Preseason Week 2 with their biggest fantasy takeaways! Plus, the latest injury updates and don’t miss the big announcement about the largest fantasy football league on earth! The Megalabowl! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 23rd, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+
  
 (03:05) - Megalabowl Announcement
 Join the largest fantasy football league on earth at Megalabowl.com
 (07:05) - News & Notes
 (17:45) - Preseason Power-Up
 (19:10) - Trey Lance 
 (21:10) - Zach Wilson/Corey Davis 
 (27:45) - Teddy Bridgewater/Drew Lock
 (29:55) - Najee Harris
 (32:15) - J.K. Dobbins/Gus Edwards
 (34:00) - Myles Gaskin
 (36:25) - Javonte Williams
 (38:25) - Texans Backfield 
 (40:15) - Xavier Jones
 (41:15) - Michael Carter
 (43:45) - Andy Dalton/Justin Fields
 (44:45) - Ja’Marr Chase
 (50:25) - Pat Friermuth
 (53:30) - Logan Thomas
 (55:00) - Mailbag
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Want even more fantasy football goodness? Visit our Community Forums to chat everything fantasy football, or JoinTheFoot.com to join our fantasy football community.
  
 Check out today's sponsors:

The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason react to Preseason Week 2 with their biggest fantasy takeaways! Plus, the latest injury updates and don’t miss the big announcement about the largest fantasy football league on earth! The Megalabowl! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 23rd, 2021.

 

Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+



(03:05) - Megalabowl Announcement

Join the largest fantasy football league on earth at Megalabowl.com

(07:05) - News & Notes
